tech_demo

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • tech_demo.TechDemo
        • tech_demo.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class Animation
extends TechDemo
implements java.util.Observer
    Implements a couple of simple animations to be displayed on the Launchpad S.
    Includes a few command specific pads which are:
    - [0][2] Previous Animation
    - [0][3] Next Animation
    - [0][5] Reduce amount of simultaneous animations
    - [0][6] Increases amount of simultaneous animations
    - [0][7] Quit Animations

    Also includes a counter to know how many total animations have been displayed.

    Animations available:
    - Waves
    - Fireworks
    - Random lines
    - Big single wave
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion
